title: How to Draw Kratos

steps.headline: Draw a circle for the head.
Draw lines below the circle to form Kratos' chin and jaw.
Place a pair of lines below the chin for Kratos' neck.
steps.description: Then draw guide lines to estimate the placement of his eyes and nose.

steps.headline: Using the head as a reference point, draw guide shapes for his torso and limbs.
Begin drawing the facial details (eyes, nose, mouth, etc.)
Using the rough guide shapes, trace the outline of Kratos' head and body.
Erase unnecessary lines and polish details.
Draw a large oval for the head.
Draw lines below the oval to form Kratos' chin and jaw.
Draw guide lines to estimate the placement of his eyes and nose.
Using the head as a reference point, draw guide shapes for his torso and limbs.
steps.description: Remember that in chibi style, the head will always be of greater size than its entire body.

steps.headline: Begin drawing the facial details (eyes, nose, mouth, etc.)
Using the rough guide shapes, trace the outline of Kratos' head and body.
Erase unnecessary lines and polish details.

text: Regular Kratos Draw a circle for the head.  Draw lines below the circle to form Kratos' chin and jaw.  Place a pair of lines below the chin for Kratos' neck. Then draw guide lines to estimate the placement of his eyes and nose. Using the head as a reference point, draw guide shapes for his torso and limbs.  Begin drawing the facial details (eyes, nose, mouth, etc.)  Using the rough guide shapes, trace the outline of Kratos' head and body.  Add armor details.  Add weapons.  Erase unnecessary lines and polish details.  Color the drawing as desired.  Chibi Kratos Draw a large oval for the head.  Draw lines below the oval to form Kratos' chin and jaw.  Draw guide lines to estimate the placement of his eyes and nose.  Using the head as a reference point, draw guide shapes for his torso and limbs. Remember that in chibi style, the head will always be of greater size than its entire body. Begin drawing the facial details (eyes, nose, mouth, etc.)  Using the rough guide shapes, trace the outline of Kratos' head and body.  Add armor details and weapon.  Erase unnecessary lines and polish details.  Color the drawing as desired.
